artist: Utagawa Hiroshige II; Publisher: Fujiokaya Keijirō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Describes the garden of nezu shrine:
{Nezu gongen to shōsaruru wa Susanōnomikoto ni ???
hiroku tsukiyama sansui ari azumaya no hana ????
satsuki no koro kirishima-tsutsuji saku?????}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Views of Famous Places in Edo (Edo meishō zue)
title: Nezu
